task.title: DWFx
task.shortdesc: Export ZWCAD drawings as Web DWFx formats using DWFOUT or PLOT command. As a two dimensionalvector file, DWFx publishes ZWCAD drawings on Web or Intranet network.

context.p: DWFx file supports real-time panning or scaling and controls how the layers and named views are
To export a drawing to a DWF file

step.cmd: Choose File > Plot from the mainmenu.
Choose DWFx ePlot(XPS Compatible).pc5 for the Name option from the Printer/plotter area on the Plot dialog box.
Specify the location and the name for the DWFx file in Browse for Plot File dialog box.
